DOC.brief_summary: The aim current project validate PDE4 inhibitor target cognition enhancer ( proof-of-concept ) use translational behaviour-EEG approach . The project demonstrate whether memory , also attention , information processing executive function improve PDE4 inhibitor roflumilast healthy human .
DOC.criteria: 18 35 year age Healthy ( i.e . absence exclusion criterion ) , normal static binocular acuity ( correct uncorrected ) , Body mass index 18.5 30 Willingness sign inform consent . Positive evaluation memory screen History cardiac , hepatic , renal , pulmonary , neurological , gastrointestinal , haematological , psychiatric illness Firstdegree relative psychiatric disorder ( particular major depressive disorder suicidality ) Excessive drinking ( > 20 glass alcohol contain beverage per week ) Pregnancy lactation Use chronic medication oral contraceptive Use recreational drug 2 week precede participation Smoking Orthostatic hypotension Lactose intolerance Sensory motor deficit could reasonably expect affect test performance
